author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period (3 days) has elapsed.

Since you are registering a new package, please make sure that you have read the package naming guidelines: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1



---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
Shouldn't this package be named `ZarrStorageTrees`, since it's specific to the Zarr format? The name `StorageTrees` would imply something more generalâ€¦

What do you think about the name `SmallZarrGroups.jl` or `InMemoryZarr.jl`? If I have Zarr in the name people may assume the package can lazily read chunks of a huge dataset. But this package eagerly loads all data in the directory into memory and saves everything all at once, so I think there should also be something like `Small` or `InMemory` or `Eager` in the name.

Both `SmallZarrGroups.jl` and `InMemoryZarr.jl` are totally fine from a general perspective. In general, having three words in a package name usually means that the name is unique enough not to raise any concerns. So pretty much any word you might want to add to or insert in `StorageTrees` would be fine.

Also: this is really just a suggestion. If you want to stick to `StorageTrees`, I can make my comments non-blocking ;-)

I renamed the package to SmallZarrGroups 

This PR can be closed. New PR https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/79259

This pull request has been inactive for 30 days and will be automatically closed 7 days from now. If this pull request should not be closed, please either (1) fix the AutoMerge issues and re-trigger Registrator, which will automatically update the pull request, or (2) post a comment explaining why you would like this pull request to be manually merged. [noblock]
This pull request has been inactive for more than 30 days and has automatically been closed. Feel free to register your package or version again once you fix the AutoMerge issues. [noblock]
